body_html:
Without testing the code:
AlreadyExistsError might be because you redefine the TensorArray at every iteration of the while_loop.

It does not seem like the the TensorArrays you define are dependent on anything in the while_loop. Try defining them outside (before).
body_text:
Without testing the code:
AlreadyExistsError might be because you redefine the TensorArray at every iteration of the while_loop.
It does not seem like the the TensorArrays you define are dependent on anything in the while_loop. Try defining them outside (before).
body:
Without testing the code:
`AlreadyExistsError` might be because you redefine the TensorArray at every iteration of the `while_loop`.

It does not seem like the the TensorArrays you define are dependent on anything in the `while_loop`. Try defining them outside (before).
